Artificial Intelligence.Description: A conversational AI framework designed to assist sales teams by providing instant responses to customer queries. The system leverages Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to fetch the most relevant information and uses Large Language Models (LLMs) for natural language processing, ensuring accurate and real-time assistance.

Artificial Intelligence.Project_Name: Recipe for Rating: Predicting Food Rating using ML
Artificial Intelligence.Description: Developed a predictive model for estimating food ratings based on ingredients, cooking methods, and other culinary factors. The project involved data collection, exploratory data analysis (EDA), feature engineering, and training machine learning models to detect patterns in food preferences.
Core_Features: Food rating prediction based on ingredients and cooking styles
Data-driven approach using machine learning models
Exploratory data analysis for feature selection

Data Science.Description: Automated the resolution of noisy, colored alphanumeric CAPTCHAs using OpenCV and deep learning. The system preprocesses images by removing noise, enhancing contrast, and segmenting characters before applying an Optical Character Recognition (OCR) model to extract text.
Core_Features: Automated CAPTCHA solver using image processing
Character segmentation and OCR-based text extraction

Data Science.Description: A document processing tool designed to extract structured data from PDFs without relying on Large Language Models (LLMs). The system uses rule-based natural language processing (NLP) techniques and regex patterns to parse text efficiently.
Core_Features: Efficient document parsing without LLM dependencies
Structured data extraction using regex and NLP

Software Engineering.Description: A full-stack web application for managing grocery store inventory and sales. The system features an admin dashboard for inventory management, product categorization, order processing, and user authentication.

A multi-user platform that connects customers with household service professionals. Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) to manage different user types, including administrators, service professionals, and customers. The system allows users to schedule services, manage appointments, and receive reminders.
Core_Features: Redis caching for faster service retrieval

Software Engineering.Description: A to-do list application that allows users to create, update, and delete tasks. Built with Flask for the backend and SQLite for persistent data storage, ensuring a lightweight yet efficient task management experience.

A chatbot-style web application that enables users to ask questions about PDF documents and retrieve precise answers from the content. The system employs document embedding techniques and similarity searches to extract relevant information.
Core_Features: User-friendly web interface for document queries
